title: Being real about relationships
creator_credit: Laurie Tesoriero, Betti Wood, Family Film Movement and Pilgrim Films
brief_description: In the second half of the Twentieth Century there have been developments in contraception. The film explains the rhythm, the calender, the temperature, the ovulation, the withdrawal, the barrier, the diaphragm, the condom, the IUD, the pill and the sterilisation methods.
creator_credit_for_label: Laurie Tesoriero, Betti Wood, Family Film Movement and Pilgrim Films
